Original:
bar_runner_elijah
Yoi
到達店門口，映入眼簾的是地板的石子路，頗為特別。進去之後，發現他們只有很長的吧檯，並沒有其他桌子後來在官網上看到有句話”我們沒有其他位子，只有一個11公尺的長長的吧臺，過來的人一起交個朋友吧！”
老闆和店員真的都是非常健談，並且具有豐富的酒類知識，對此話題非常有興趣的我，就算在醉也還是爬起來和老闆聊聊。

豪氣沖繩人
將琴酒明顯的胡椒味和辣感再放大，賜予這杯調酒豪氣的粗曠感，配著麻麻的花椒及細膩質感的上白糖，既有真性情且不失優雅的感覺。

沁涼透明的沖繩假期
沖繩是個能無時無刻都能輕而易舉的看得到海的地方。以黃檸檬帶出的清爽酸感，配上沖繩盛產的鳳梨，山苦瓜，酸甜感中又嚐些苦味，通寧水使味道更加提升，令人想立刻去海邊放個假。

只可惜當天好像少了甚麼材料，老闆說這並不完美，要下次補償我們哈哈。我們也對老闆不好意思，喝得醉醺醺才跑過來，太豐富的調酒做給我們喝有點暴殄天物(反省)。Yoi雖然店內也有餐點，但也允許客人點外送到店裡。當天，我們就和老闆，其他客人一起點了台北夜間通路知名炸雞-全球炸雞，真的好吃啊!尤其配酒。

Yoi店內不只提供調酒，還有多種啤酒任選，以及品飲威士忌，品飲的時候老闆還會敘說各個威士忌的故事。如果以酒吧擬化成人的化，這家Yoi就像朋友，久沒見也可以從南聊到北，情感依舊的朋友。

bar_runner_elijahh
Yoi
When you arrive at the door of the store, you are seeing the stone road of the floor, which is quite special.After entering, I found that they had only a long bar counter, and there was no other table and later saw a saying on the official website. "We have no other seat, only a 11 -meter long bar counter. People who come over and make friends together! "
The boss and the clerk are really very talkative and have rich knowledge of alcohol. I am very interested in this topic. Even if I am drunk, I still get up and talk to the boss.

Okinawa
It enlarge the obvious pepper and spicy taste of the piano wine, and give it to the roughness of this cup of bartender, with the numb peppercorns and the delicate texture of the sugar, which is both true and elegant.

Qinliang and transparent Okinawa holiday
Okinawa is a place where the sea can be easily seen at all times.With the refreshing sourness brought out of yellow lemon, coupled with the pineapple rich in Okinawa, the mountain bitter gourd, the sweet and sour taste, and the taste of the sourness. Tongning water makes the taste more improved.

Unfortunately, it seems that there is no material that day. The boss said that this is not perfect, and we will compensate us next time haha.We are also embarrassed to the boss, and we ran over to drink drunk. Too rich bartending made us a little bit storm (reflection).Although YOI also has meals in the store, it is also allowed to be sent to the store.On the same day, we ordered the well-known fried chicken with the boss and other guests-global fried chicken-global fried chicken, which is really delicious! Especially with wine.

The YOI store not only provides bartender, but also has a variety of beer options, as well as whiskey. When drinking, the boss will also tell the story of various whiskey.If the adults are intended in the bar, this YOI is like a friend. You can talk from the south to the north for a long time.
